item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Shaily Engineer and Orissa Minerals Highlight Market Trends
item.description: As the curtain falls on the September 2025 quarter results, a comprehensive analysis of nearly 4,000 stocks reveals nuanced trends across market capitalisations and sectors. Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Shaily Engineer and Orissa Minerals Development Company Ltd emerge as notable performers, reflecting diverse sectoral dynamics and financial outcomes in a complex market environment. Time: Dec 20 2025 09:00 PM IST

item.title: Are Orissa Minerals latest results good or bad?
item.description: Orissa Minerals' latest results show a mixed picture: while there was a year-on-year sales growth of 7.44% and a return to profitability with a net profit of ₹3.14 crores in Q2 FY26, the company faces significant challenges, including negative equity and substantial accumulated losses, raising concerns about its long-term financial health. Time: Dec 20 2025 07:10 PM IST

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Shaily Engineer and Orissa Minerals Lead Market Trends
item.description: As the Sep-2025 quarter earnings season concludes with 3,990 companies reporting, the market reveals a nuanced picture of corporate performance across sectors and market capitalisations. Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Shaily Engineer and Orissa Minerals Development Company Ltd. stand out among the top performers, reflecting varied sectoral dynamics and financial outcomes. Time: Dec 20 2025 06:00 PM IST

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Shaily Engineer and Orissa Minerals Lead Market Trends
item.description: As the Sep-2025 quarter earnings season concludes with 3,990 companies reporting, the market reveals a nuanced picture of corporate performance across sectors and market capitalisations. Positive results were recorded by 43.0% of companies, marking a slight rise from 40.0% in the previous quarter, reflecting a cautious but steady trend in earnings growth. Large caps, mid caps and small caps displayed varied outcomes, with mid caps showing the highest proportion of positive results at 50.0%. Time: Dec 20 2025 03:00 PM IST
